description: The Semantic Web Rule Language (SWRL) is based on a combination of the OWL DL and OWL Lite sublanguages of the OWL Web Ontology Language with the Unary/Binary Datalog RuleML sublanguages of the Rule Markup Language.  SWRL includes a high-level abstract syntax for Horn-like rules in both the OWL DL and OWL Lite sublanguages of OWL.
name: SWRL: A Semantic Web Rule Language Combining OWL and RuleML
